text: Bit-O-Honey is an American candy. It was introduced in 1924 by the Schutter- Johnson Company of Chicago. It is currently owned by the Bryan, Ohio-based Spangler Candy Company. Bit-O-Honey is a honey-flavored taffy with almonds. It is sold as individually wrapped, bite-sized candies, available in bags or theater-size boxes. Category:Candy
title: Bit-O-Honey
